exemples: Earlier in her career she was nicknamed the 'Poor Olympian' due to the financial challenges she faced
Running, watching movies, football, chatting with friends
Graduated from Shirak State University (Gyumri, ARM)
Graduated with a Master's degree from the Armenian State Institute of Physical Culture and Sport (2023)
Studied at the Armenian State Institute of Physical Culture and Sport (Yerevan, ARM)
He followed his father and his uncle into the sport

While doing karate he noticed wrestlers training and decided to give it a try. He also tried judo but his father, a former wrestler, did not allow him to do both, so he chose wrestling. (sport.mediamax.am, 10 July 2017)
“My family did not like wrestling very much. At first I wanted to do boxing but my older friends advised me to go to wrestling training, and after a week, I started to like the sport.” (myInfo)

Footballer Zinedine Zidane (FRA), World Cup winner (1998) and European champion (2000) with France, won the Champions League as a player and three times as a manager with Real Madrid, three-time FIFA World Player of the Year
Wrestler Armen Nazaryan (ARM, BUL), two-time Olympic champion (1996, 2000) and 2004 bronze medallist. Eight-time world championship medallist (three gold, two silver, three bronze)
Race walker Luis Fernando Lopez (COL), four-time Olympian (2004, 2008, 2012, 2016), 2011 world champion (20km walk)
"My coach Luke Preston. We've been a team for the last 12 years." (Athlete, 25 Jun 2024)
Momodou Lamin Kujabi, a former international athlete from The Gambia who was once his physical education teacher
"To become a good athlete, you first have to be a good person." (ankakh.com, 6 Oct 2018)
“Nothing is impossible, set goals in front of you, fight and achieve it.” (Instagram, 13 May 2023)
Uncle, Roman Amoyan (wrestling), 2008 Olympic bronze medallist and two-time European champion in Greco-Roman
Uncle, Salvador "Chava" Sabrino (diving), finished 11th in the 10m platform event at the 1980 Olympic Games and is head coach for the Australian national team
Partner, Iker Casas (taekwondo), won a bronze medal at the 2018 Central American and Caribbean Games (63kg) and a silver at the 2021 Pan American Championships (68kg)
In competition she wears a ring or earrings her family gave her
When she is preparing for a competition, applying her makeup and combing her hair, she watches the film Hercules.  "Once I’m ready I listen to music that makes me dance a little.” (intlgymnast.com)
Competed in marathon swimming at London 2012. Finished 20th in the 10km. She also competed in the Marathon Swimming World Cup circuit and at multiple world championships
He was 2019 sambo world champion at 82kg (held in Cheongju, Republic of Korea)
Football: Plays as a striker for the Malawi national team. Won the 2023 COSAFA Women's Championship final
